# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(60, -60)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
-  Check the status of burner entities to ensure they have enough fuel

### Errors when using stone furnaces without ingredients
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to stone furnaces before using them
-  Check the status of stone furnaces to ensure they have enough ingredients

### Errors when using steam engines without connection to electric network
-  Make sure to connect steam engines to the electric network before using them
-  Check the status of steam engines to ensure they are connected to the electric network

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Make sure to provide fluid to pipe groups before using them
-  Check the status of pipe groups to ensure they have enough fluid

### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Make sure to provide items to belt groups before using them
-  Check the status of belt groups to ensure they have enough items

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
